resources.string: Vous devez vous connecter pour voir vos statistiques
Ceci n\'est pas l\'application officielle de Common Voice. Il est dévellopé par Saverio Morelli sans aucun support ou agréments avec Mozilla.
En continuant, vous acceptez les termes et les services de Common Voice.
L\'application Common Voice a besoin de la permission du \"Microphone\" pour fonctionner correctement.
L\'application Common Voice a besoin de la permission du \"Stockage\" pour fonctionner correctement.
Choisissez votre langue native, elle sera utilisée pour montrer des phrases à enregistrer et valider
Pour modifier les informations de votre profil, rendez vous sur le site officiel.
Donate to the developer on PayPal
Press the icon below to start the recording
Press the icon below to stop the recording
Recording correct? Send it.\nRecording wrong? Record the sentence again
Listen the recording entirely to ensure it\'s correct
Press the icon below to stop the listening
Recording is too long. Max duration is 10 seconds
Sending recording failed! Try again to send it otherwise press {{*{{skip_button}}*}} button
Press the icon below to start the clip
Press the icon below to stop the clip
The clip is correct? Press the Thumb up\nThe clip is wrong? Press the Thumb down
Press the icon below to start the clip again
Error. Try again, so press {{*{{skip_button}}*}} button
Error during the sending of the recording. The audio wasn\'t sent to server
Error during the sending of the validation. Try again or press {{*{{skip_button}}*}} button
Internet connection isn\'t available now. Please, connect to WiFi network or mobile data and then press on the button below
This is the sentence you must record.
Here you can find sentences which guide you every time.
If you don\'t like the sentence, you can tap on this button to skip and get another one.
Tap on this icon to start the recording.
Tap on this icon to stop the recording.
Tap on this icon to listen the recording.
Tap on this icon to record again the sentence, in case there are mistakes in the previous one.
Tap on this icon to listen again the recording.
Tap on this button to send the recording.
This is the sentence/clip you must validate.
If you don\'t like the clip, you can tap on this button to skip and get another one.
Tap on this icon to play the clip to validate.
Tap on this icon to stop the listening of the clip.
Tap on this icon if you want to listen again the clip.
Tap on this icon if the clip coincides with the sentence, so to accept it.
Tap on this icon if the clip doesn\'t coincide with the sentence, so to reject it.
